DataElement.preferredName: Pharmacologic Substance Investigational New Drug Indicator java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic substance including endogenous body substance used to diagnose, prevent, maintain, treat or analyze abnormal and normal biological functions in vivo or in vitro._An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether an agent possesses a New Investigational Drug status._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pharmacologic Substance Investigational New Drug Indicator
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic substance including endogenous body substance used to diagnose, prevent, maintain, treat or analyze abnormal and normal biological functions in vivo or in vitro._An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether an agent possesses a New Investigational Drug status.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic substance including endogenous body substance used to diagnose, prevent, maintain, treat or analyze abnormal and normal biological functions in vivo or in vitro.

Concepts.definition: Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.

Property.preferredDefinition: An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether an agent possesses a New Investigational Drug status.

Concepts.definition: An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether an agent possesses a New Investigational Drug status.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 12/1/10 released DEC per direction of model owner as part of caDSR model cleanup activity.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
